alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:12AM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations from a light glaze to 1 tenth of an inch. Sleet may mix in at times with the freezing rain before ending this morning. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...Through 6 PM CST Today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
